faqs.question: What makes GrowWise different from other educational centers?
faqs.answer: GrowWise combines personalized K-12 instruction with cutting-edge STEAM programs. We maintain small class sizes (max 6 students for K-12, 4 for STEAM) and use innovative teaching methods that make learning engaging and effective.

faqs.question: What age groups and grade levels do you serve?
faqs.answer: We serve students from Kindergarten through 12th grade (ages 5-18). Our programs are specifically designed for different developmental stages, ensuring age-appropriate learning experiences.

faqs.question: Do you offer both in-person and online classes?
faqs.answer: Yes! We offer both in-person classes at our Dublin, CA location and online classes with the same quality instruction and personalized attention. Many families choose a hybrid approach.

faqs.question: How do you assess my child's learning needs?
faqs.answer: We provide free 60-minute assessments for K-12 subjects and 30-minute trial classes for STEAM programs. This helps us understand your child's current level, learning style, and goals.

faqs.question: What are your class sizes and teacher-to-student ratios?
faqs.answer: We maintain small class sizes with maximum 6 students per K-12 class and 4 students per STEAM class. For one-on-one tutoring, it's complete individual attention.

faqs.question: What payment options and financial assistance do you offer?
faqs.answer: We accept credit cards, bank transfers, and offer flexible payment plans. We provide sibling discounts, early bird pricing, and need-based scholarships for qualifying families.
